title: Contribution of epigenetic modifications to evolution - Wikipedia
htmlTitle: Contribution of epigenetic modifications to evolution - Wikipedia
snippet:
Epigenetics is the study of changes in gene expression that occur via 
mechanisms such as DNA methylation, histone acetylation, and microRNA 
modification.
htmlSnippet:
Epigenetics is the study of changes in gene expression that occur via
mechanisms such as DNA methylation, histone acetylation, and microRNA
modification.

snippet:

test is based on DNA methylation levels.
